name: Magic Borderless
description: Your ultimate assistance to painless gaming on borderless window with automatic fullscreen detection! Magic Borderless can detect fullscreen games and apply settings automatically. The app provides extra features like Ninja Mode to give you assist on certain tasks *wink* *wink*.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1 & 10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel or AMD with 1 GHz or faster Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Something a little better than Voodoo graphics cards Storage: 10 MB available space Sound Card: Literally none Additional Notes: May even run on a potato
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1 & 10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel or AMD with 1 GHz or faster, but if you have 9900K you get more gamer points Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Something that can run Crysis, but it will run well on Intel HD Graphics Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Literally none, but do you want to play games without a sound card? Additional Notes: It's an app developed to run on a lot of potatos so thy games can run at maximum performance. If it somehow runs slow, give us a spank on our forums
